        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1637</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friendship</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freundschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amitié</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Friendship</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Amicizia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φιλία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Amistad</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will complete several activities related to a poem on the subject of friendship</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">poem</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger führen einige Aktivitäten durch, 
die auf einem Gedicht bezüglich der Freundschaft in Verbindung 
gestanden werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants termineront plusieurs activités 
liées à une poésie au sujet de l'amitié</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners terminarão diversas atividades 
relacionadas a um poema no assunto do friendship</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti completeranno parecchie attività 
relative ad un poem a proposito di amicizia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα ολοκληρώσουν διάφορες δραστηριότητες 
σχετικές με ένα ποίημα σχετικά με το θέμα της φιλίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes terminarán varias actividades 
relacionadas con un poema a propósito de amistad</string>
